There's a few places where bors is merging things with itself replacing the author as commiter, so the PR isn't being detected as merged

rust-clippy#8236 a6f80fccb19a52305ff88d960b4bb4e74df3d8b2
rust-clippy#8219 786f874c349b995ebed5e3d8f20db1cf65f20782
rust-clippy#8209 262b148d8830efa4773f05b27403f94e47d27f52

Not sure why, nothing stands out to me as different for those PRs to the other ones

I believe that this happens when @bors r+ squash was used. That has at least happened to one of my PRs when it was merged like that. I think it's beneficial to keep the original contributor, but bors can't commit something in your name without creating "unverified" commits for users who have that enabled. It would also be messy to implement.
Ahh I missed the squash part. Yeah seems so, looks like they are intending to change it though https://github.com/rust-lang/homu/issues/136
And there is already a PR to fix this https://github.com/rust-lang/homu/pull/152
Even if a bit stale :sweat_smile:
I think we should avoid bors squash for now
